en.434198591176339456: They really, really love you too.
en.434627962089402368: I've seen water turn to glass. Flowers turn to metal. It's dire.
en.434627965256101888: And then her expression changes again. She's still smiling and I see tears begin to form in the corners of her eyes, but she holds them back.
en.434629957986709504: It even works on your map, so be sure to place a bunch and get as much of the Labyrinth covered as possible if you're looking to collect loads of Prisma Plorts, something we'll need when you find me.
en.434629960771727360: Well, fun if it weren't for the fact that the world around you at the time is likely exploding with dangerous energies and unstable plorts are flying out of your tank...
en.434634062582935552: Either way, it's an adventure, right?
en.434637451849003008: In some ways my arrival to this place was just in time. In time and altogether out of it I suppose..
en.434638300511891456: ...I still don't know if it was real or not.
en.434639513852735488: I spent so many days just huddled in caves trying to find the courage to press on. But I knew I had to. I had to get back to Rainbow Island and find a solution.
en.442195192629063680: And then she tells me that she is so sorry my grandmother never had the chance to meet me.
en.442195194155790336: She puts a hand on my shoulder and is about to say something else but the comm station rings and she turns her head.
en.442195194625552384: I can't remember anything more after that.
en.459162059549601792: Hi, Beatrix. It looks like there are still some Harmonizers that need to be activated.
en.459163070364282880: I need to prepare a bit more.
en.459163407372414976: Come back when you’re ready. I’ll be waiting.
en.459163883820183552: Once more, I’m counting on you, Beatrix.
en.494426433331556352: I really hope so. My guess is that anything unstable or out of place here is a result of the prisma waves blanketing the Labyrinth and transmuting things. If I could invent something to nullify them in just a localized area, it might be enough for you to uncover where the Harmonizers are hidden.
en.494426435990745088: How can you build something like that?
en.494426436984795136: Well, for starters, I'll need prisma plorts to make the blueprint. I'll need to run all kinds of prisma tests to figure out the parameters we're working with.
en.497217680223924224: Hello again! I’ve linked this Exchange Station to my facility here, so we can exchange things that you find for things I can make.
en.528451741088903168: And by the way, I can also exchange prisma plorts for coins you can spend at a kind of underground market... Something I discovered while looking for some of the special tech I needed to build my facility.
en.503065643299008514: As for actually building it... those strange shadow slimes might be the answer. Their plorts have a natural dampening effect on prisma waves. Maybe they evolved to do that somehow? They can flatten the wavelengths in order to…
en.503065643299008515: Sorry, I'm getting caught up in things here. Just keep an eye out for shadow plorts, as they might be useful later. In the meantime, bring me your prisma plorts, and then I can get to work on the nullifier device.
en.503065643299008518: We're getting closer, Beatrix. Let’s see this thing through.
en.508172740122537984: I rigged up this hydro shower for emergencies, but there’s no water running to this place, just a lot of pipes. If we can somehow get water running, it will definitely prove useful… trust me.
en.512135795118338048: Use the Nullifier to open hidden paths in the Labyrinth. Try looking for walls that look strange, as if they were altered by prisma waves.
en.512137435087007744: Amazing! You activated all the Harmonizers, so we're almost ready to start the process of stabilizing the Prismacore.
en.512137648556109824: To make this work, we're going to need a lot of water, but it looks like you don't have a water tank. Try crafting one at the Fabricator in the Conservatory, then come back and let me know when you're ready.
en.512137991872475136: This is it, Beatrix. With the Harmonizers activated, and with your help, I can attempt to stabilize the Prismacore.
en.512152448220688384: Beatrix! All the readings from the Prismacore… they’re stable! It’s on a completely different wavelength than before! I… I can feel it.
en.512404458169856000: Here it is, Beatrix… the Prismacore.
en.512404595482980352: I was breathless when I first saw it. Seeing the way light twisted and moved within it, the way it seemed to change with every moment… It was like staring into the infinite. If I only knew then what would become of it, of me... of everything.
en.512405717933256704: I’m sorry to have brought you here. To have you pulled you into all this. But it was the only way.
en.512520617573642240: And like I was saying, I think I can invent something that can uncover hidden areas in the Labyrinth.
en.512528636512464896: Keep looking for weird walls. If you use the Nullifier in front of them, it should have some effect and allow you to pass them. Hopefully, you'll find the Harmonizers in there, so we can try to stabilize the Prismacore.
en.512531865044414464: I’m counting on you to get those plorts so I can develop the Nullifier blueprint. It’s a shot in the dark, but we have to hold on to hope, Beatrix.
en.512775262921453568: It will take a long time for the land to fully heal and effects like prisma disruptions to stop. But Rainbow Island — no, the future of the whole Far, Far Range has been saved. You did it, Beatrix. We did it. And I can’t thank you enough.
en.512855595578716160: Now that you have my Nullifier gadget blueprint, go ahead and craft it at the Fabricator in the Conservatory. Then it’s up to you to start looking for those hidden areas behind strange walls.
en.528438915377033216: But never mind that. The important part right now is working on that nullifying device. So go get those plorts!
en.515407435033899008: Recorded message: Hi, Beatrix! I've left the Exchange Station on automatic. You can deposit prisma plorts to get rainbow coins whenever you want. Have fun!
en.515408179648688128: This is a recorded message: You’ve activated all the Harmonizers! Please come talk to me over by the Prismacore. Now the real work begins…
en.522633243620175872: Thank goodness you’re back. I was able to shut down the process and clear the room just in time. Really glad I installed that emergency shower!
en.523379801986854912: Hi, Beatrix. I've been calling this area the Terrarium.
en.523379808395751424: I'll head on in to check it out right now.
en.523379809226223616: Well... you know, a terrarium is just a container that keeps plants outside of their usual environment.
en.523379810023141376: The first time I came through here, that's what it looked like to me. Just a biosphere, though a really beautiful one, with unique food and slimes.
en.523379810853613568: And... maybe that's true. It's possible that this is just a way to represent the outside world here in the Labyrinth, safely behind glass.
en.523379811671502848: But... I'm no longer so sure.
en.523379812455837696: So what do you think it really is?
en.523379814079033344: That's the thing, Beatrix. I have no way of knowing, not really. But...
en.523379814884339712: I'm very sure the Labyrinth as a whole is a facility that was intended to contain and stabilize the Prismacore. So logically, the Terrarium is here for some Prismacore-related reason.
en.523379815681257472: And if I think about what that could be...
en.523379816478175232: I wonder if it's a seed bank of some kind. Like, if things went really bad in the future, if the Prismacore became too unstable and really, truly breached... this would be a way to ensure that some of the flora would survive the ensuing calamity.
en.523379817296064512: If so, that would mean the Terrarium is basically, well, an insurance policy, so that if the worst happens, there could be a do-over.
en.523379818885705728: What part of that do you relate to?
en.523379819695206400: I'll try to stop it before it gets to that.
en.523379822186622976: O-of course I want to think that my actions in the past might help save the future. I mean, I think it's natural to want to set things up so the future can be better, even if there's no way to know for sure what helps.
en.523379823839178752: If you think of it another way: to all those who exist in the future, what's happening right now is the past. We want those people of the future to look back at what we're doing and feel like it made all the difference to them.
en.523379824648679424: Or, better yet, we want to make it so they never had to worry in the first place.
en.523379825487540224: What we do here will make all the difference eventually. I have to believe that.
en.523379826301235200: All we can do is live in the moment. I'll head onward.
en.523379827114930176: Things are in a bad state, but... there's a lot to see and love here. I hope you can take the time to enjoy it, too.
en.523380587600965632: It's almost like some kind of museum!
en.523380589240938496: That might be what glass cases say to us, but I believe they're here for another purpose. Actually, I'm convinced that they have something to do with the manipulation of time.
en.523380590050439168: I've observed the ones with plants for a while, and I've noticed that time's moving faster inside these cases than outside of them.
en.523380590868328448: I think that it must be some way of analyzing the Prismacore's effects on the natural world. Perhaps they're a way to help predict what would happen in the event of a breach.
en.523380591715577856: Is it happening with the tiny buildings too?
en.523380593342967808: It might be, but I'm not sure.
en.523380594135691264: Maybe it is, or maybe it's manipulating space instead... or even a third thing that's so alien to us that we'll never have the context to figure it out
en.523380594928414720: There are so many mysteries on Rainbow Island, Beatrix, and I don't think we'll solve even half of them in our lifetimes.
en.523380595721138176: Sometimes all you can do is look through the glass and wonder about what's happening on the other side.
en.523380596513861632: Do you feel that way often?
en.523380597340139520: I've felt that way for a long time, honestly.
en.523380598174806016: You know, my whole life was planned out: I'd grow up and then take over the ranch, just like my mom took over from Grandma. One day, I'd pass the ranch down to a child of my own. It was all meant with such love. A beautiful home, our family legacy.
en.523380598980112384: To me, it was such a small world, like being in one of these domes here, pressing my hands against the glass and imagining the life I'd be living if I hadn't been born on a ranch.
en.523380599785418752: I came here to Rainbow Island to try to live that other life. But I'm trapped again now, this time for real. Isn't it ironic? I'm behind glass, shut away like everything else in here.
en.523380600670416896: I'll head out to help free you as soon as I can.
en.523380601471528960: I know we have to hurry, but take some time to enjoy what's in front of you, too.
en.523382731968245760: Oh no... there's gold here. So even the Terrarium is starting to be affected. At least it's probably still a useful shortcut.
en.523382735625678848: Anywhere close to the Prismacore can be affected by its reality-altering properties. Materials changing from one to another, switching from solid to liquid or gas, flickering entirely out of existence...
en.523382736426790912: Outside the Labyrinth, it's seemingly harmless changes, but here, it's more dangerous. Imagine if the section of the floor you're standing on vanished under you, or if the only door out became a wall of solid rock...
en.523382737257263104: And the gold... that seems to be the most potent of the transmutations, and it's probably the fate of this world if left unchecked.
en.523382738058375168: It all feels like King Midas from my storybooks.
en.523382739689959424: It's an old myth about a king named Midas who wished to have all he touched turn to gold. He became rich beyond measure, but soon discovered that he could no longer eat or drink, and withered away.
en.523382740512043008: When I first discovered the Prismacore, I was horrified at seeing the whole ecosystem turning to gold. I called for help, but those that arrived saw only the value of that gold.
en.523382741329932288: ...It ended in disaster when they tried to harness its full power. I won't let that happen again. We can't.
en.523382742143627264: So I should hurry and make use of that shortcut?
en.523382742982488064: Right, I remember there being one there. Though my memory isn't that reliable these days.
en.523382743829737472: Shortcuts are funny things. Space and time are both full of shortcuts, when you think about it — I mean, I used my memories of the area and quantum tech to set up these projectors. That's a kind of time-based shortcut.
en.523382744668598272: Physical shortcuts are maybe more recognizable. Knowing there are quick ways back to places you've been before... it can make all the difference, right? It can completely change what you'd otherwise do. I know it has for me.
en.523382745478098944: Though I suppose we often find ourselves in the same place in the end, one way or another.
en.523383596829536256: Beatrix, look out the window. There's so much more out there than I'd realized.
en.523383598784081920: So why did you put the projector here?
en.523383599606165504: It's amazing... but I'd better press on.
en.523383600424054784: I haven't. I don't remember seeing anything out those windows. I saw it for the first time just now when you activated the projector.
en.523383601229361152: You know, back then, I really thought I'd walked through the whole facility. I was pretty sure I'd had this whole place mapped out.
en.523383602017890304: But times like now, I catch glimpses of what feels like an infinite expanse out there, labyrinth as far as the eye can see. Was it here the whole time and I just... missed it?
en.523383602810613760: Maybe it wasn't, though. It might be made using quantum architecture. That means it could be here in a moment and then gone in a flash... or even both here and not here at the same time.
en.523383603599142912: I mean, I make use of quantum tech often enough myself. It'd be foolish to overlook the possibility.
en.523383604450586624: How have you been using quantum tech?
en.523383605264281600: I feel like I should move on before this place vanishes too.
en.523383606057005056: Oh, a few ways. You're interacting with one right now.
en.523383606879088640: The projectors themselves aren't quantum in nature, but how I placed them was. You've been unlocking all sorts of gates to get here, right? Well, it's not that I've gone through, placed things, and then locked up again behind myself.
en.523383607663423488: Back when I first came here, it was all open and unlocked, so I wandered all over the place. I've used quantum technology to place the projectors in places I remember having seen.
en.523383608443564032: Though... my memory isn't as reliable as it used to be, so some of them may have gotten lost in transit. I guess we'll find out if and when you activate them.
en.523383609236287488: So what memory did you use to place this one?
en.523383610091925504: I'll keep looking for the rest, then.
en.523383610918203392: Well, I placed this one because I remembered this lovely little tree. Strangely, a memory came back to me all of a sudden...
en.523383611719315456: So, there was this one Tabby Slime that was always hanging around the ranch back home. It was just a wild slime, but it came around all the time, and by the afternoon would always just bounce away again.
en.523383612520427520: And one day... I decided to follow it.
en.523383613338316800: It took me deep into the woods. After a while, it did a wiggle at this huge tree and then began to climb it, just jiggling its way from branch to branch all the way up.
en.523383614231703552: I followed it. Partway up, I lost sight of the slime, but I kept climbing. Soon enough, I broke the tree cover, and... oh, Beatrix, I don't know how to put it into words.
en.523383615057981440: I'd never been so high up, and I'd never seen so much of the big, wide world. My entire life had been in the acres around my home, and there I could see just... everything. Trees blanketing the Far, Far Range, birds flying above...
en.523383615863287808: It took my breath away. I stayed up there for hours until my mom came looking for me. Boy, did she give me an earful.
en.523383616693760000: It wouldn't be the last time I disappeared on her to see the wider world...
en.523383617561980928: We'll get you out to see the world again.
en.523383618426007552: Better make like a tree and leave, then. See you, Beatrix.
en.523361207534120960: I want to start by thanking you again. Because of you this world has a future. We all do.
en.523368386513235968: I’m sorry to have made this a recording, but I needed to move on, and saying that I’m bad with goodbyes is definitely an understatement.
en.527357008383995904: I’m afraid I still can’t greet you in person. I would have loved to thank you properly. But I’ve locked myself away in the facility on the other side of this room. I’ll try to explain everything. After all you’ve been through to get here, I at least owe you that much.
en.527357083470426112: So let’s start over. My name is…
en.527357752021512192: I’m the granddaughter of Hobson and Thora.
en.527359885328412672: You might not believe this, but… the short answer is that I’m from the future. In my time, I discovered Rainbow Island and the Prismacore, and… things went badly. It was rapidly destabilizing, and when I tried to fix it, I only made it worse. I called the wrong people to help, and they tried to exploit its unnatural power.
en.527360055189336064: Everything quickly fell apart after that. There was an explosion. Prismatic light tore across Rainbow Island and into the atmosphere of the Far, Far Range. I shielded myself from the blast, but my arm… something happened.
en.527360902036090880: But if you’re here, what about back… home?
en.527361539041816576: My world — the Far, Far Range in my time… it’s on the brink of disaster. The Prismacore’s energy has blanketed the atmosphere and has begun to warp the environment as it has here: changing trees to metal, water to glass, and even phasing the natural world out of reality.
en.527361573745487872: In time, there will be nothing left to sustain the ecosystem. Faced with that… knowing that I had a hand in causing it all… I had to do something.
en.527360305023053824: The energy from the Prismacore imprinted itself on me. I can feel it coursing in my arm despite my efforts to contain it. It’s why I’ve sealed myself away and needed your help: when I get near the Prismacore it causes the destabilization to accelerate, like it’s reacting to its own energy signature.
en.527363917346402304: So how did you… travel here?
en.527364226567270400: Remember during your previous journey in the Glass Desert, where my grandfather led you to a “portal beyond space and time?” When you got there, it seemed like it was ruined.
en.527364268539670528: Well, that’s because I had already used it. I was able to direct the one in my world to this point in our timeline. There was just one problem…
en.527364314953838592: …It crumbled from the shock of activating when I arrived. I didn’t realize it would be a one way trip.
en.527365580824145920: Yes. Perhaps there’s a way of repairing the portal, but like so many things here, it’s beyond my understanding. So I have to accept that I will never return home... never see my family again.
en.527365598020792320: But it will be worth it if we can somehow stabilize the Prismacore. If we can do that, then not only do we save everything here and now, but it will fix my mistakes in the future. I have to believe that.
en.527366192357863424: How do we stabilize the Prismacore?
en.527366405030047744: In my research here, I have discovered that whoever built the Grey Labyrinth created devices called Harmonizers designed to stabilize the Prismacore… only they just didn’t work. There’s evidence that it was attempted multiple times, each time having the opposite effect and making the situation worse.
en.528419886759309312: Oh? What did he say? Never give up? To keep pushing through when all the odds are stacked against you? My mom always said grandpa had a way with words.
en.527366769041108992: But if they didn’t work before, how will it work this time?
en.527367021353660416: I’ll have to explain later. But I think I have something that maybe they didn’t… something that might allow it to work this time.
en.527367034532163584: There’s only one problem: the Harmonizers are lost. There’s no record of where they are located. Heck, there’s no record of what they even look like. I am completely in the dark here and don’t know what to do.
en.527649944011173888: Because of you I can dream again, dream about a life I can call my own. Because of you I can finally live as who I was always meant to be.
en.527650043873357824: But there’s still more I need to do. I need to study the ecosystem and ensure that it too can move on despite the damages it endured. But I also need to walk barefoot in the grass. To smell flowers in the wind.
en.527650273687662592: I need to be still and watch the clouds crawl slowly across the sky. And I need to visit a friend and play Go well into the night.
en.527650329715175424: I need to just live, Beatrix.
en.527650471629451264: The Conservatory is yours now. I know it’s in good hands. The way you have cared for it, for the silly little creatures of this world, and the way you so selflessly aided me here…
en.527650601434771456: You have a very good heart, Beatrix LeBeau. And I am very happy to have met you.
en.528371201086222336: It works like this: the Prismacore is constantly emitting a chaotic array of energy waves that seemingly take the form of color in our world. But it’s totally out of sync with our world, in a way that runs deep, like in an elemental way. That’s how it warps reality around it.
en.528371269646315520: But this is where you come in. The Harmonizers you activated emit a special energy pulse that reverberates through the whole of the Labyrinth. Combined, they form a kind of harmonious energy wave, and when directed at the Prismacore, it attempts to change it, to make it harmonious too.
en.528372202270781440: But you said it was attempted before and never worked?
en.528372807345270784: Yes, that’s true. But I think I have something that the architects of this system did not: my arm.
en.528372915524759552: I can feel the energy waves of the Prismacore in my arm. I can feel its chaos… and so I think I will be able to change its wavelength and create that harmony. Because I’ll be able to feel it myself.
en.528373981557452800: Ok, what do you need me to do?
en.528374290384056320: Once you’re ready, I’ll begin overlaying the Harmonizer’s wavelengths onto the Prismacore. This will cause incredible disruptions and send the Prismacore into a state of chaos until we can actually stabilize it.
en.528374334084509696: This chaos will have a volatile effect on the world around us, transmuting even slimes into masses of horrible Tarr that will fill this room and ultimately destroy everything unless we do something about it.
en.528374369555738624: I’ll need you to fight back and destroy all the Tarr before they destabilize the Prismacore and take us down with it. Normally, water can’t exist here for long. It turns to glass this close to the Prismacore.
en.528374611244118016: But the Harmonizers resonate through the water that flows here now. So grab it when you can and wipe out those Tarr!
en.528375375807016960: What if things get really out of hand?
en.528377335033524224: I’ve got you covered! I’ve rigged a hydro shower above the Prismacore. It only needs to build up enough pressure to be used. So to do that, pack it full of slimes! Not only might it save the day, but you’ll save some slimes with it.
en.528378858748669952: Also, I’ll store the contents of your vac tank during the process so you’ll have plenty of room for slimes.
en.528378932769746944: I know this all sounds like a lot, and a total long shot. But it’s our only chance.
en.528382405372440576: Can you explain how all this is going to work again?
en.528406570288705536: This is it, Beatrix. With the Harmonizers activated, and with your help, I can attempt to stabilize the Prismacore. Are you ready?
en.528405914672852992: I’m ready to give it another shot.
en.528383473615532032: When you’re ready, we can try this again. I believe in you.
en.528420089105117184: You know, your grandfather once gave me some great advice.
en.528422067466039296: But where do we even start?
en.528421599239106560: The only way to find something hidden is to look for it.
en.528422403345903616: I’ve seen some funny looking walls here. Seems like a good place to start.
en.528422630249361408: Beatrix, that’s it! I kept thinking I’d find a door or something I couldn’t enter. But what if they’re hidden in plain sight? I… I think I could make some new tech that you could use to test this theory.
en.528422765066874880: Head on over to the Exchange Station on the balcony above and I’ll get you set up!
en.528428037764182016: What happens to the Prismacore now?
en.528428360129998848: Time will tell, but I think it can remain here as yet another part of this world we all call home. Humans were never part of this world until we landed here one day, and now look at us! We managed to be a part of it all and not destroy it in the process. That’s the way it should be.
en.528428517668057088: Even the Prismacore was once lost out in the void of space before it landed here, and now it's part of this world too. It’s got to find its true place in all of this… just like me.
en.528428859898097664: I can feel a change in my arm. It's still connected somehow to the Prismacore, but it’s not like before. There is a quiet to it now, just a low hum of energy. It feels… peaceful.
en.528428932321144832: I will need to run more tests to truly know, but I think that I might finally be able to leave this chamber.
en.528429332436774912: There’s something I need to do out there. I need to finally talk to someone and let them know that my mom tried so hard — that I tried so hard and that I just couldn’t be that person. And that every day my mom felt such guilt about not being that person either…
en.528429399419809792: I might not see you again for a while. I’m so sorry.
en.528429609311170560: Sometimes our journeys take us away from our friends and those we love.
en.528432241819938816: I once had someone tell me you need only to look up at the stars.
en.528432745895587840: No matter how far you go, their light will touch you both.
en.528433025672441856: But what if where you are is beyond any distance, beyond time?
en.528433367000707072: Their light was here before us, and it will be here after.
en.528433499536519168: I hope she sees them. I hope she knows I’m safe now.
en.528433676435484672: Thank you, Beatrix. For all that you have done here, for me, and all that you have yet to do. The Far, Far Range is a better place with you a part of it.

zh.108799766524456960: 喂？喂？碧翠丝，听到了吗？测试，测试……唔……难道你迷失在大海里，被神秘的船带走永远都——
zh.108799766549622784: 不好意思，刚刚忘了开显示器了！
zh.108799766549622785: 真高兴又见到你了，碧翠丝！想死我啦，我的好伙伴。
zh.108799766553817088: 虽然我也在为你的新冒险感到振奋，可我这边已经有了些貌似比较麻烦的数据……
zh.108799766553817089: 昨晚我收到一条来自于某种人工智能程序的信息，是用我不认识的代码写的。我现在正在破解。
zh.108799766553817090: 不过我很确信这条信息是从你目前的所在地发来的，也就是神秘的彩虹岛。
zh.108799766553817091: 简单扼要地说就是：一艘神秘的船把你带到一个神秘的岛上，而我接到一条来自这个神秘岛屿的神秘代码，这一切都那么……
zh.108799766553817092: 耐人寻味。好吧，我还有事要忙，你也继续探索吧。
zh.108799766553817093: 哦！差点忘了，给你这个返程传送点。应该能让你的初期行程轻松些。
zh.108799766553817094: 要小心啊，碧翠丝。保持联系！
zh.108799766553817095: 碧翠丝，我办到了！我应该是破解了那条超级神秘的代码。
zh.108799766553817096: 它复杂到令人惊讶。我相信创建了这条代码的人工智能具备可以跟我一较高下的智能。非常高级……都接近外星人水准了。
zh.108799766553817097: 哦，你应该很在意代码里说了什么吧？这条神秘，疑似为外星人工智能发给我的信息说……
zh.108799766553817099: 话虽不多，但也是有意义的！更重要的是，当我破解代码的时候，我收到了另外一条信息。
zh.108799766553817100: 那感觉就像……这个神秘的人工智能在观察我？多么令人兴奋！
zh.108799766553817101: 但这条代码要复杂得多，我还没能破解。太有意思了！我要回去干活啦。
zh.108799766553817102: 嘿，碧翠丝。我得告诉你，我解开另一条人工智能的密码啦。它显然已经适应了我之前的解决方案，并创造出了更复杂的东西。真聪明。
zh.108799766553817103: 这一次，这条代码显示了一组往复通信的指令。所以我一直在花时间和它交谈。
zh.108799766553817104: 它问了很多问题。有些了解我以后，它就问了很多关于工作上的事。感觉就像它能探知出我的专业领域一样。
zh.108799766553817105: 我必须承认，这一切太让人心花怒放了。我曾经是那个提问的人。有一段时间，我的整个生命都是问题和随之而来的研究……
zh.108799766553817106: 但是有了这段经历之后，我觉得自己似乎在别人身上感受到同样的感觉。虽然这看起来可能很奇怪，毕竟我是在人工智能中感觉到这一点的。
zh.108799766553817107: 你知道嘛，当我开始提问的时候，它回答的方式让我觉得它在试图防护自己……
zh.108799766553817108: ……为了掩藏它内心深处的孤独。
zh.108799766553817109: 我知道是挺奇怪的。毕竟对方是人工智能，但谁能说任何形式的智能都不想与另一个智能建立联系呢？
zh.108799766553817110: 我觉得这个故事还没结束。如果这件事到此为止的话，我也很高兴曾经陪伴这位新朋友。我会继续提问的，让我的问题们有寻找答案的理由。
zh.108799766553817112: 碧翠丝！有些关于这个人工智能的事，我必须跟你共享。
zh.108799766553817113: 如你所知，我们一直在相互提问。渐渐地，问题的往复越来越快也更随意，几乎就像一段很自然的对话一样。
zh.108799766553817114: 我以为它只是在进化并适应它在我身上观察到的聊天方式，可后来发生了一些事情……
zh.108799766553817115: 好吧，我们聊着聊着就玩起围棋来了。这样一来我可以进一步测试它的智能，不用想，它肯定也在测试我。
zh.108799766553817116: 我们能玩到很晚。尽管我知道自己的交谈对象只是一个复杂的代码集合，我们的对话还是变得越来越自然起来了。
zh.108799766553817117: 然后有一天到了日出时分，它提出再玩一场。我随口说：我得给自己泡杯咖啡才能再接着熬……
zh.108799766553817119: 我盯着屏幕，不知道该说什么。突然间，它仿佛意识到自己刚才做了什么一样，断开了连接。
zh.108799766553817120: 从那以后……我们就失去联系了。可我真希望我们还保持着联系。
zh.108799766553817121: 我会一直等待我们恢复联系的那天，也会一如既往地忙于工作，问那些需要答案的问题。但与此同时我会预备好围棋棋盘……总有一天再和它下盘棋。
zh.108799766553817122: 再见碧翠丝，希望很快能再跟你聊聊。
zh.108799766553817123: 嗨，碧翠丝。送给你这个，这样不会太唐突吧。呃，希望你喜欢。
zh.108799766553817124: 通常我都会使用一种算法来判断礼物是否合适，不过这次我……放飞了一下。
zh.108799766553817125: 我承认这种自主行为让我自己也有点怕。
zh.108799766553817126: 碧翠丝！我需要你的一个数据点。我正在做一个关于接受礼物的心理影响的实验。
zh.108799766553817127: 请告诉我你有以下哪种感觉：感激、喜悦，或者……饥饿？
zh.108799766553817129: 哦碧翠丝，我整晚都在努力合成送给你的完美礼物。提出假设，测试，把结果扔进垃圾桶，重头再来……
zh.108799766553817130: 最后我发现了另一种方法：网购。
zh.108799766553817131: 这个过程出人意料地简单。
zh.108799766553817132: 你好啊碧翠丝，自从我们相识以来你给予我很多帮助，我想对此表示感谢。在你的支持下，我相信自己已经进步成一个更好的人了。
zh.108799766553817133: 根据我的研究表明，我应该送给你一个小礼品。所以请收下这个。
zh.108799766553817134: 哦碧翠丝，我在整理实验室的时候发现了这个。可能你会用得上吧？它应该还在正常运作。
zh.108799766553817135: 我听别人说，自己用不上的还能拿去送人。收下吧！
zh.108799766553817136: 哦，对了，我得告诉你，我看到这件道具的时候它在大喊你的名字。
zh.108799766553817137: 我就是这样不小心用感知射线击中它的。不过不用担心，现在一切都很好，很正常。
zh.108799766553817138: 不管怎么样你应该拥有它。收下吧！
zh.108799766553817139: 对不起，碧翠丝。我正处于水深火热之中。具体来说就是，我正处于烤面包机和洗衣机的纠结之中。
zh.108799766553817140: 我又在进行机器人实验了。进展得挺顺利！
zh.108799766553817141: 抱歉碧翠丝，我现在无法参加对话、聊天、闲谈，甚至搞个笑都不行。
zh.108799766553817143: 你好碧翠丝！尽管看上去一模一样，我并不是维克多，而是维克多为了接受信息而开发的全息影像，所以这不是我。
zh.108799766553817144: 请留下你的信息，我会确保信息会传递给维克多，而不是给我。
zh.108799766553817145: 你能想象得到吗？碧翠丝·乐步跑去开展了另一段冒险，却都不想着带上她的好姐妹、偶尔是劲敌，兼永远的导师——莫奇·迈尔斯！
zh.108799766553817146: 说真的小碧，下次你再跑去一个危险的未知领域，至少也跟我打声招呼行不行？
zh.108799766553817147: 当你需要我的时候，我希望能在你身边……
zh.108799766553817148: ……帮忙收集那些散布在岛上的所有值钱的资源。
zh.108799766553817149: 什么？你真以为我不会做一点侦察吗？如果监视卫星不能窥探东西，要它们有什么用？
zh.108799766553817151: 算了，反正你注意安全。这个岛给我一种奇怪的感觉，我会继续到处探查的。
zh.108799766553817152: 哦对了，既然你要到处开采，拿着这个精炼链接，应该能让你轻松些。我会算在你的账上的，回头见喽，小土豆。
zh.108799766553817153: 嘿小碧，你在岛上发现的那些到处都是的无人机……有些蹊跷。
zh.108799766553817155: 嘿，既然我能在天上布下眼线，我就得好好用它们。我还准备了一支无人机队伍前往那边，并以更实际的方式去探测……好吧跑题了。
zh.108799766553817156: 不管怎么样，那个无人机好像非常先进，像是外星制造的。所以我本来觉得，应该有些外星人和你一样在探索无人岛。但并不是这样的。
zh.108799766553817157: 那个无人机和我们用的非常相像……但对我来说更为熟悉，甚至给我一种似曾相识的感觉。真瘆人！
zh.108799766553817158: 嘿，你别怕，可能只是外星人吧。个头很大还长了三个头，有着巨大的爪子，会抓人或吃人，要么就抓走再吃。
zh.108799766553817161: 小碧！我一直找你呢。我分析了一架你在那座岛上发现的无人机，搞明白为什么它让我感觉如此熟悉了。它是我的。
zh.108799766553817162: 或者至少是我以前……在梦里见过的。
zh.108799766553817163: 看过无人机的扫描以后，我知道这架无人机很熟悉，所以就去浏览了一些我过去的史莱姆科技日记。这些日记大多是未来的项目，有时也是测试性技术。
zh.108799766553817164: 你知道，为了让莫奇科技能够在行业里独领风骚，我总是将视角放得很远。唔，不过有时也会想出一些自己一辈子也建造不出来的东西。
zh.108799766553817165: 你找到的那些无人机就属于这种情况：曾在我日记中出现，而当今科技不可能制造出来的东西。它们就是我曾经的梦想啊，小碧！
zh.108799766553817166: 所以，这些我设计的本不可能出现的无人机跳出了日记跑到彩虹岛去了？
zh.108799766553817168: 或许……或许无人机里有某种档案，我们可以解锁来了解更多信息。我知道那里会有数据日志，但如果是我……嗯，我总是知道如何找到阻拦自己的方法……
zh.108799766553817169: 好吧小碧，我需要一些时间思考，等我有想法了就跟你联系。可能得想个一晚上吧……
zh.108799766553817170: 嘿小碧，有些东西想让你试试。老实说，要是成功了我可能会吓个半死。
zh.108799766553817171: 我制作了一个钥匙设计图：一种特殊的档案密钥，用在你找到的那些无人机上。如果无人机中有档案数据存在，这个钥匙应该可以取得那些档案。
zh.108799766553817172: 我说“应该可以”是因为我自己心里也没底。如果那些无人机真的按照我日记中的设计建造出来，那么我会用这个钥匙取得它们的档案。
zh.108799766553817173: 我知道这些话让人难以置信，但我希望你能试试。如果成功获取档案了，至少也能帮你更多地了解彩虹岛上发生的事……
zh.108799766558011392: 很高兴能帮到你，我还欠你个人情对不对？
zh.108799766558011393: 呃，我什么都没说！把这个破钥匙造出来，先别告诉我它管不管用。
zh.108799766558011394: 要是管用的话，我也没做好心理准备呢。
zh.108799766558011395: 回头见喽小土豆，祝你好运。
zh.108799766558011396: 嘿小碧，有些东西我正打算扔掉，转念一想，小碧那么喜欢我不要的破烂垃圾，那她应该会喜欢这件的。
zh.108799766558011398: 嘿嘿嘿碧翠丝！你猜全宇宙最幸运的人是谁？
zh.108799766558011399: 就·是·你！因为本莫奇·迈尔斯送了你一件礼物！
zh.108799766558011400: 给你时间缓一下。有必要的话你也可以坐一会儿。
zh.108799766558011401: 我说小碧，你之前不是说过想要更多东西吗？
zh.108799766558011403: 算了算了，好好享受这些东西吧。
zh.108799766558011404: 嘿，小碧，我送了你一件礼物。因为……我也不知道为什么。反正希望你能喜欢。
zh.108799766558011405: 不管你喜不喜欢反正就是送了。
zh.108799766558011406: 哟小碧，给你一点东西，只是“一点”而已。
zh.108799766558011407: 因为我给自己弄了个更气派的。比这个强多了。
zh.108799766558011408: 抱歉小碧，现在没法聊天。我为了某个非常重要的东西忙疯了。
zh.108799766558011409: 比你想要的东西重要多了，抱歉。现在没空听你报告近况。
zh.108799766558011411: 抱歉小碧，开会要迟到了顺便问句我的发型还不错吧开玩笑的我的发型一向完美无缺我得走了拜！！
zh.108799766558011412: 哼，你会后悔遇见本莫奇·迈尔斯的，就等着——
zh.108799766558011413: 啊，小碧！抱歉，我还以为是另一个电话。我呢，呃，正在跟一个竞争对手解决点事情，聊个天而已。
zh.108799766558011414: 雷猴，碧翠丝！你在吗？是我，奥格登·奥提兹！
zh.108799766558011415: 我听说你正在一个充满秘密和危险的神秘岛屿上进行一次全新的大冒险，或许还有一些尚未被发现的多汁水果或蔬菜存在吧？
zh.108799766558011416: 你知道我不得不问！自从你为我提供了稳定的库卡多巴果供应以来，我在致远牧星达到了进一步的烹饪高度！
zh.108799766558011417: 而且我也吃腻了库卡多巴派、库卡多巴蛋奶酥、库卡多巴布丁、库卡多巴夹肉、库卡多巴夹……库卡多巴。
zh.108799766558011418: 我已经没有灵感……和动力了。
zh.108799766558011419: 要是你有新发现，一定要告诉我。除了美味佳肴，我想了解所有你新发现的动植物。
zh.108799766558011420: 千万别忘了：这个野性世界的一草一木和每一寸土地都是宝贵的，值得我们关注和尊重。
zh.108799766558011421: 还有记得补水！在外冒险会让你大汗淋漓，带上这个水龙头吧。
zh.108799766558011422: 祝你好运，碧翠丝。保持联系，我会为你加油的！
zh.108799766558011423: 碧翠丝！真高兴你联系我了。
zh.108799766558011424: 我看了你发给我的彩虹岛的照片。毫无疑问，这些风景太引人注目了！如此美丽，看得久了，这些色彩仿佛也越来越丰富……
zh.108799766558011425: ……但也有些不自然。很抱歉，不得不说这个地方有些不对劲。
zh.108799766558011426: 如果你还记得，我曾经是一家非常成功的快餐公司的老板，转基因食品是我们的专长。
zh.108799766558011427: 为改变天然食品，让它们长得更大、更快、成本更低廉，我们付出了漫长的努力。但我并不为此感到自豪。因为我曾经为了利益而剥夺了它们美好的部分。
zh.108799766558011428: 我这么说是因为，当看到一种植物时，我仍然可以发现它被不自然地改变过。而你在那个岛上看到的美丽彩虹并不是自然而然地出现在那里的。
zh.108799766558011429: 我不清楚对你来说会不会有危险，但这个岛让我心里有些闹腾。我得再多做些研究，晚些联系你。
zh.108799766558011432: 哎呀，对唔住啦，碧翠丝！我最近一直在熬夜阅读。
zh.108799766558011433: 具体来说就是，我一直在查阅能在致远牧星找到的每一份地区指南和植物研究论文。
zh.108799766558011434: 我本以为，就算彩虹岛的植物如此不同寻常，也应该会在我们能接触到的信息上有所记录。
zh.108799766558011435: 然而我什么都查不到。在哪里都找不到任何提到彩虹色植物的记录。因此，这意味着彩虹岛是最近才变成这个模样的。
zh.108799766558011436: 其实用不着我来告诉你这些吧，因为你已经亲眼见过了。你所描述的那些事，整座岛从中间分裂成两种不同的颜色……
zh.108799766558011437: 对我来说，意味着“意外事件”。
zh.108799766558011438: 你要小心谨慎。自然对我们来说可能非常危险，但只要我们加以防范，就能减少风险。
zh.108799766558011439: 我会继续在我的图书馆里查找可以帮助到你的信息。要是没能帮到你，我就给你烤些松饼！
zh.108799766558011440: 不管怎样，我撑你，碧翠丝。拜拜！
zh.108799766558011441: 雷猴碧翠丝！见到你真高兴。希望你有用心照顾自己，出去冒险前记得吃饱饱哦？
zh.108799766558011442: 我理解情况变得越来越复杂了，你在岛屿尽头见没见到过某种单体结构？
zh.108799766558011443: 吓死个人了！但或许我的直觉是正确的，所有奇怪的植物群都不是自然的……
zh.108799766558011444: 碧翠丝，有些事不合情理。我们在致远牧星上发现的所有遗迹，似乎都没有曾经破坏过环境的迹象。
zh.108799766558011445: 当然，我们也不知道这些遗迹的存在目的和建造者是谁。但我一直觉得他们是尊重这个世界的。
zh.108799766558011446: 但是破坏环境的事可能还是发生了。远足的时候，有时你会为了避免踩碎一朵花而踩到另外一朵。
zh.108799766558011447: 让花儿们继续生长的唯一方法，也许是一开始就别靠近它们。
zh.108799766558011448: 这也并不全都是悲观和绝望的：彩虹岛看起来依然很朝气蓬勃。大自然会寻求平衡，但也不是绝对的。
zh.108799766558011449: 唉，你看我，怎么跟你说教起来了。对唔住啦，碧翠丝。就不耽误你的功夫了。
zh.108799766558011450: 我不知道你会在那些墙壁之外找到什么，但我相信你会做出正确的判断。
zh.108799766558011452: 嘿我嘅朋友！有个小礼物送给你。并不是自制的，也不是派，更不是自制的派……
zh.108799766558011453: 可我觉得你一样会喜欢的。抱歉不是派……
zh.108799766558011454: 雷猴啊，小碧！我为你买了点东西，希望对你有用。
zh.108799766558011455: 要是你已经有一个了，我也不能退货……多多益善嘛，对不？
zh.108799766558011456: 嘿小碧，我有件特殊的东西要给你！现在给你应该刚刚好……
zh.108799766558011457: 啊，不过现在我有点拿不准了。唔，要是时机不对的话，也别告诉我。我的小心脏承受不了！
zh.108799766558011458: 小碧，关于你的单人冒险生活，有件事我是了解的。那就是，你的朋友们都很惦念你，可你却没法收到足够的提示。
zh.108799766558011459: 所以我来给你发条提示！这条提示是个小礼物。通过它来让你想起我，还有咱们在一起的好时光。拜拜，小碧！
zh.108799766558011460: 嘿我嘅朋友，你过得好不？当我觉得孤单的时候，我就出门为朋友做点事。这样一来马上就觉得舒坦了。
zh.108799766558011461: 这样做代表着我在牵挂你哦。
zh.108799766558011462: 抱歉小碧，现在聊不了天！我所有的非常母鸡都飞出了鸡舍！这可是一场鸡飞狗跳的大动乱！要是我明天还没回信，那就是我被推翻赶下台了。
zh.108799766558011463: 对唔住，小碧。我要从烤箱里拿出一个非常巨大的蛋奶酥，需要我全神贯注一丝不苟。
zh.108799766558011464: 然后我就要开始享用这个非常巨大的奶蛋酥了，同样需要我全神贯注一丝不苟。
zh.108799766558011465: 嘿我嘅朋友，现在没法跟你聊。我有一大盘菜要处理，尤其是处于成熟期的怪洋葱色拉。
zh.108799766558011466: 为此我得吃下很多胡萝卜，这可不容错过！
zh.108799766558011467: 哎呀，这不是碧翠丝·乐步嘛！我正跟老霍聊起你呢。听消息说，你渴望新的冒险，所以就跑去未知的世界了吗？
zh.108799766558011468: 好姑娘！你只需要继续前行，去探索下一个奇妙的地方就好。要是靴子破了洞，就买双新的继续走！
zh.108799766558011469: 我嘛，我的靴子也曾历经风霜，不过我知道还得再来个一两趟冒险。只是得弄清楚是哪个冒险……
zh.108799766558011470: 哎呀，我怎么跟霍布森一样叨叨起来了，他一说起探险、宇宙、烹饪，呃，差不多什么话题都能叨叨好一阵。
zh.108799766558011471: 好了小碧，你加油吧，我会再打给你的。不管是谁，远离家园的时候就会思念它。
zh.108799766558011472: 啊，趁我还没忘，给你点东西，你可以拿它归置你的新地盘。东西并不贵重，但你得尽量让自己的居所舒适嘛。
zh.108799766558011473: 好呀，小碧！彩虹岛的生活怎么样？哎，还用说嘛，肯定开心死了吧！
zh.108799766558011474: 你知道吗，自从听说你开始了新生活，我也好好审视了一下自己的生活，我的“新”生活又是什么呢？
zh.108799766558011475: 霍布森和我都见识过也经历过很多了，在这颗飞沙走石的星球上完成了一个又一个冒险。即使我们相识以后，也从没放慢过脚步。
zh.108799766558011476: 我们正在考虑一起挑战一个新的冒险，只是还没确定去哪里，或是什么样的冒险。
zh.108799766558011477: 也许我们会像你一样，去探索致远牧星上某个隐匿的角落；或是将目光放到其他星球上，就像当年霍布森那样。
zh.108799766558011478: 不管我们决定如何，这都将是一场非同寻常的旅程，因为这次我们俩会彼此分享。这一点让一切都那么令人兴奋！
zh.108799766558011479: 在这个世界上，要找到一个完全适合你的人真的太难太难了。就像在沙漠中找到两片相同的雪花那么不容易。
zh.108799766558011480: 我知道你比谁都明白其中的含义。
zh.108799766558011481: 我永远不会忘记自己有多么幸运。我会善用宇宙赠予我的这些最好的礼物。
zh.108799766558011484: 哎，小碧，能联系到你真好。有件大事要跟你分享，要知道这颗星球上并没有多少人能听我倾诉。
zh.108799766558011485: 我和霍布森一直在琢磨下一段冒险去哪里。我们把对方的旅行日记都读了一遍，想找到一个我们都没去过的地方。
zh.108799766558011486: 虽然也找到几个地方，可没有一个能引起我们兴趣的。或许我们真的放慢脚步了吧？
zh.108799766558011487: 然后我们谈了谈，发现目前我们最享受的还是在我的牧场上彼此陪伴。
zh.108799766558011488: 这座牧场是致远牧星上最早那一批，而我俩也在这里学到了很多东西……我们聊到，要不就把知识传承给下一代吧……
zh.108799766558011489: 于是呢小碧，我们决定组建一个家庭。这是我记事一来第一次有害怕的感觉！
zh.108799766558011490: 我跟霍布森都很独立，我们都不知道该如何做父母，更不用说在致远牧星抚养孩子了。
zh.108799766558011491: 但我很爱那个傻老头，而且一想到有个小家伙用他的眼睛望着我，我脸上就会浮现微笑……
zh.108799766558011492: 我觉得只要能实现，哪怕让我搬座山我都愿意。
zh.108799766558011493: 所以我有事忙了，那么多事要准备！
zh.108799766558011494: 谢谢你听我倾诉。有时候跟人倾诉自己心中的恐惧，才能更勇于面对这些恐惧。
zh.108799766558011496: 好啊小碧，你的探险怎么样了？听说你正忙着解开那里的谜团，听起来可真让人激动！
zh.108799766558011497: 我啊，真想知道为什么带娃会这么难！我爬过那么多山，都比用六角扳手组装婴儿床轻松……
zh.108799766558011498: 算了，我跟霍布森就是想跟你道声谢。没有你的话，我们可能也意识不到想要孩子的意愿。
zh.108799766558011499: 我总能在你身上看到自己的影子。你继承了霍布森的破旧牧场以后我意识到，在这个世界上留下自己的痕迹很重要，但是看到年轻人用自己留下的东西去创新，是非常有意思的事。
zh.108799766558011500: 我很期待见到我们的孩子将来会怎么打理这个牧场，或是走上其他人生道路。
zh.108799766558011501: 所以谢谢你，小碧。我和霍布森都很感激你出现在我们的生活里。我永远都会祝福你的。
zh.108799766558011503: 霍布森想知道，你本来能用玻璃荒漠古代遗迹里那个古老的装置开启一段宇宙大冒险的，为什么你却决定不这么做？
zh.108799766558011504: 我跟他说，霍布森·推格斯，一个女人要不要穿越星际去旅行，那是她自己的事。可他就是那么固执和好奇。
zh.108799766558011506: 那东西坏了？不对劲呀……霍布森说他离开之前，已经让那东西准备妥当，可以迎接下一个想要冒险闯荡的人了。
zh.108799766558011507: 好吧碧翠丝·乐步……看来你已经为自己找到了下一个谜题。
zh.108799766558011508: 祝你好运了，小碧！等一切都结束的时候你真应该为自己写本书。肯定会是一个宏大的冒险故事！
zh.108799766562205696: 你好呀，小碧。我想送你点好东西，所以就做了点饼干。可是吧，呃，烘烤不是我的拿手活……
zh.108799766562205697: 霍布森说那些饼干非常……可食用。
zh.108799766562205698: 好吧，最后我还是给你买了点东西，希望你能喜欢！
zh.108799766562205699: 你知道吗小碧，大家都说最好的礼品是饱含心意的礼品。
zh.108799766562205700: 这一件是从商店买的……不过也很有心意对不对？
zh.108799766562205701: 嘿小碧，我知道这是在瞎操心，可我还是担心你一个人能不能胜任那些辛苦的工作……
zh.108799766562205702: 所以我就给你发了一个小护理包。希望它能帮你提提神！
zh.108799766562205703: 哈哈哈，别担心，我会跟她说的！你安静点，我正跟她通话呢！
zh.108799766562205704: 嘿小碧，霍布森想送给你这个……他说你要是不想要，还能拿去当柴火，相当好用！
zh.108799766562205705: 我很想跟你好好聊聊，可我得去接霍布森了。拖拉机又在田地里抛锚了，我会帮你带好的！
zh.108799766562205706: 小碧，抱歉现在不能聊天。暴风雨在我这边闹腾，我煮的这壶咖啡也不消停。这两边我都得留神，得挂了！
zh.108799766562205707: 抱歉小碧，我得把电话线留给霍布森。霍布森有个朋友，是个穿着风衣的怪人，他俩总喜欢天南地北地瞎聊。我是根本不明白他俩在鬼扯什么。
zh.108799766562205708: 亻尔女子月月友亻火亻半
zh.108799766562205712: 衣兄亻尔有个女子又鸟iiiii！！！
zh.108799766562205722: 黑占黑占黑占黑占黑占
zh.189978717438996482: chIkkY chikkY CHiky CcHiikyy ChIKKYYY ChIkYy cHiIky
zh.296439123520204800: 你好，碧翠丝。看起来你对建造装置很有兴趣，为了支持你的务实和创造性努力，我准备了一份小小的乔迁礼物。
zh.322591486284390400: 期待看到你造出来的东西！
zh.418299640669696000: 是……是你！难以置信。天呐。呃，你好，碧翠丝……那个，乐步女士。呃，碧翠丝还好吗？
zh.418299640694861824: 抱歉，我只是不敢相信我在和你说话。你可是我家乡的……传奇人物。
zh.418299640694861825: 对不起，你可能有一箩筐的问题，但我很抱歉，我能帮你的只有这么多了。
zh.418299640694861826: 我现在的处境是，在我们把事情搞定之前，我都得一直盯在这里。这是一项非常精细的工作，所以我们得长话短说。
zh.418299640694861827: 噢！对不起。我应该做个自我介绍的。我是琪琪，是个植物学家，还是个探险家，最近也是一项外星技术的临时专家。
zh.418299640694861828: 很抱歉我没有早点表明身份。但我必须确定你不会像其他人一样……你得让我觉得你值得信任才行。
zh.418299640694861829: 是的。我一个人做不到，而且我相信你是唯一能帮我的人。
zh.418299640694861830: 帮我拯救彩虹岛吧……也许甚至要拯救整个致远牧星。
zh.418299640694861831: 你看，当我第一次来到彩虹岛的时候，我就被它美轮美奂的景色深深吸引了，那是我之前从未见过的美景。但我最终发现这种美是有代价的。
zh.418299640694861832: 很久以前，从外太空来的东西撞上了现在的彩虹岛。慢慢地，这里的事物开始发生变化。
zh.418299640694861833: 岩石和悬崖泛着色彩，并随着草地和其他植物同样色彩斑斓的纹理而波澜起伏。
zh.418299640694861834: 甚至这里的大气都有一种超鲜艳的彩色。这种色彩无处不在，源头都是那个太空之物。
zh.418299640694861835: 那个东西，我将其称为棱镜核心，它改变了周遭一切的属性。首先是颜色，然后物质和元素也发生了变化……
zh.418299640694861836: 穿过灰色迷宫找到我。我走不开，但是等你找到这些设备的时候，我可以用它们和你联络。
zh.418299640694861837: 等你找到我，我们就能阻止这里发生的一切。
zh.418299640694861838: 我需要你帮我拯救彩虹岛……也许甚至要拯救整个致远牧星。
zh.418299640694861839: 你看，当我第一次来到彩虹岛的时候，我就被它美轮美奂的景色深深吸引了，那是我之前从未见过的美景。但我最终发现这种美是有代价的。
zh.418299640694861840: 很久以前，从外太空来的东西撞上了现在的彩虹岛。慢慢地，这里的事物开始发生变化。
zh.418299640694861841: 岩石和悬崖泛着色彩，并随着草地和其他植物同样色彩斑斓的纹理而波澜起伏。
zh.418299640694861842: 甚至这里的大气都有一种超鲜艳的彩色。这种色彩无处不在，源头都是那个太空之物。
zh.418299640694861843: 那个东西，我称之为棱镜核心，它改变了周遭一切的属性。首先是颜色，然后物质和元素也发生了变化……
zh.418299640694861844: 我需要你穿过灰色迷宫找到我。我走不开，但是等你找到这些设备的时候，我可以用它们和你联络。
zh.418299640694861845: 我会尽我所能回答你的奇思妙想。可是天呐，和另一个人类聊天真是太棒了。很久没这种体验了……
zh.418299640694861846: 祝你好运，碧翠丝。当这个地方的颜色变深的时候要多留心一点，会很吓人的。
zh.418299640694861847: 好吧，你好像认识我，但我不认识你……
zh.418299640694861848: 所以你就是那个给我写信，还派船带我来这儿的人？
zh.418299640694861851: 再告诉我一次你为什么需要我的帮助。
zh.433459818587123712: 在此期间，我会尽我所能回答你的奇思妙想。可是天呐，即使你没有什么要说的，和另一个人类聊天也真是太棒了。很久没有这种体验了……
zh.433468706430545920: 又见面了，碧翠丝。有什么需要吗？
zh.434144876759248896: 这难道不美吗？尽管发生了这么多事，但是能再次看到这一切，我心里还是有些高兴的……
zh.434144879288414208: 我……是不是还在迷宫里面？
zh.434144879774953472: 我当时在一个有奇怪光线的房间里，周遭变得很疯狂。
zh.434144880701894656: 没错，你还在迷宫里面，如果你愿意相信的话。这是对外界环境各个方面的全面再现，包括大气。
zh.434144881163268096: 但其实更令人惊讶的是它的空间有多宽阔，那里面比外面还要大，简直让人叹为观止！
zh.434144881654001664: 在这里，并不是所有的事物都在开始的时候合乎常理，抑或是从来都不会合乎常理。所以你只要做最擅长的就好了：比如探索呀，收集呀，再弄清楚探索这里的最佳方式。
zh.434144882119569408: 去熟悉这里的环境，理解事物的运作方式，后面你会因此受益的。
zh.434144882580942848: 当迷宫的某些部分开始闪耀并爆发出辉光时，你需要小心一点。
zh.434144883059093504: 我称之为棱镜干扰，那是棱镜核心产生的一种不稳定能量爆发，这种能量爆发呈波状涌动，所以你要学会辨认它们，学会如何在干扰来袭时生存下来。
zh.434144883512078336: 因为尽管棱镜干扰很危险，但它将对我们在这里的工作至关重要……迟早会的。
zh.434144883965063168: 好了，碧翠丝，如果你需要我，你知道在哪里可以找到我……嗯，差不多吧。
zh.434160849277054976: 你看过迷宫里的日落吗？夜晚的黑暗悄然降临，然而……这一切都是幻觉。或者至少，它必须是……
zh.434160851747500032: 说到黑暗，我看到的那些暗影史莱姆是怎么回事？
zh.434160852200484864: 你为什么要相信我，琪琪？
zh.434160853140008960: 暗影史莱姆是一种奇怪的史莱姆变体，似乎是棱镜核心显现出来的相反极性。
zh.434160853597188096: 我仍然不知道是不是谁专门创造出来了这种相反的力量，或者说它们是不是自主进化成这个样子的。你知道的，大自然似乎总是能找到一些平衡的办法。
zh.434160854066950144: 不管怎样，暗影结晶似乎提供了一种抑制棱镜干扰的效果。虽然希望渺茫，但也许我们可以用它来抵消棱镜核心的影响。
zh.434160854532517888: 有什么暗影史莱姆的小知识吗？
zh.434160855006474240: 他们是狡猾的小家伙，不是吗？暗影史莱姆会迅速逃离你或者棱镜干扰。所以最好的办法就是搜索那些最近没有受到棱镜干扰影响的区域。
zh.434160855480430592: 一旦你看到它们成群结队了，就要偷偷接近它们，然后在它们全都逃跑之前，尝试击打获得尽可能多的结晶。所以一定要在你的真空枪里多带些垃圾。
zh.434160855937609728: 只是别追着追着就从悬崖或者什么地方跳下去。我绝对不是以个人经验告诉你的……哎哟。
zh.434160856415760384: 我不是英雄，碧翠丝。所以我知道我需要一个真正的英雄来阻止这里发生的一切。
zh.434160856881328128: 一个英雄……一个你可以信任的英雄。我的意思是，如果你不能，那还有谁能胜任？所以我脑海中试图勾勒出的这项任务的完美人选，那就是你。
zh.434160857334312960: 我以前也被人背叛过，这就是导致一切出错的原因。曾经有人枉费了我的信任，但这是可以让我弥补错误的机会。
zh.434160857791492096: 你可能还没感觉到，但你是个英雄，碧翠丝。你迟早会成为英雄的。我保证，前路还有很多精彩的冒险等着你。
zh.434160858261254144: 很快，这将成为碧翠丝·乐步历险记的新篇章，供世界某个角落的小女孩在树下阅读欣赏，并梦想着自己的人生会像这故事里的一样辉煌……
zh.434160858726821888: 我很乐意在你需要的时候为你提供一些帮助。
zh.434166468247711744: 人们很容易沉醉其中，一边欣赏这奇怪的建筑，一边好奇它出自谁手，不是吗？
zh.434166470726545408: 你觉得这地方是谁建的？
zh.434166471175335936: 那你呢，琪琪？你来自哪里？
zh.434166472085499904: 致远牧星各地有很多证据表明，很久以前有人或有什么东西就住在这里。星球上到处都是摇摇欲坠的废墟和残余的古代技术设备。
zh.434166472546873344: 这些废墟总是令人困惑，因为它们似乎没有的特定功能，至少在我们认知范围内没有。更别提到处都是史莱姆雕像了！
zh.434166473004052480: 但是迷宫不一样，我相信它是为了一个特定的目的而建造的。
zh.434166473964548096: 我认为棱镜核心很久以前就被发现了，这个迷宫实际上是一个围绕它建造的容器和研究设施。
zh.434166474417532928: 他们无法阻止棱镜核心带来的影响，所以他们只是在尝试阻止它影响致远牧星的其余部分，与此同时寻找解决办法。
zh.434166474862129152: 迷宫被设计成一个自给自足的生态系统。我认为这是为了模拟彩虹岛的部分地区，看看棱镜核心随着时间的推移会对它产生什么影响。
zh.434166475315113984: 在迷宫之外，你已经看到了世界的大部分都变成了五颜六色的样子，但是在迷宫之内，效果会被放大，元素属性将完全改变。
zh.434166475772293120: 我们会想办法阻止它的。
zh.434166476250443776: 总有一天会的。总有一天……
zh.434166476711817216: 这个问题还是很难回答的。其实我的故乡，距离你现在称之为家的地方不算远，只是我们之前从未相遇过。
zh.434166477168996352: 我就在致远牧星出生。这里是我的家，这里是我除了书本以外所知道的一切。
zh.434166477621981184: 所以当我第一次发现彩虹岛的时候，它给我的感觉是耳目一新的，就像童年的时候在家里发现了秘密房间一样。当时，我都想永远留在那里。
zh.434166478079160320: 但现在感觉好像我已经活了很多世一样。我的童年就是其中一世，我在彩虹岛上的生活算是另外一世。现在我回来了，我想这又是另一世了。但现在，好像一切都变得模糊不清了。
zh.434166479039655936: 我获得了一次回来重新解决这里的问题的机会，但我是怎么回来的嘛……嗯，不是寻常使用的旅行方式。所以现在我的脑子总是有点乱七八糟的，像一团浆糊。
zh.434166479530389504: 我现在的记忆像被重新洗了牌一样，乱七八糟的。有时候，我昨天做过的事会让我感觉很遥远，就像是我已经变得模糊的童年记忆中的一件事……
zh.434166479983374336: ……而我童年的记忆会有时会突然变得清晰，甚至感觉那是最近才发生的事。
zh.434166480478302208: 我最早的记忆一直是坐在餐桌底下看着妈妈打扫客厅。她不知道我在那里，而我就那么看着她。
zh.434166480927092736: 我记得那天特别热，她看起来很疲惫，而且心烦意乱的。最早的记忆以前就是这个。
zh.434166481380077568: 但自从我回来，那段记忆就变了。我还是在桌子底下，她还在打扫。天气很热，她很疲惫……
zh.434166481862422528: ……但是她注意到我在那里了。她的表情突然变得又惊又喜，然后她停下了手头的家务。
zh.434166482319601664: 她跪了下来，我们聊了一些事情，但我听不到我自己说了什么。我只看到她在倾听，在微笑。
zh.434169717507911680: 真是令人难以置信的景色……太容易沉醉其中了。也就是说，棱镜干扰的出现让一切都陷入了混乱。
zh.434169719974162432: 是啊，要是没有它们，在这里找路就够难的了。
zh.434169720464896000: 我也觉得是这样，所以我一直在开发一个应该会对你有用的装置。
zh.434169720938852352: 我把它叫做干扰探测器，把它放在迷宫周围，它就会告诉你什么时候棱镜干扰会在那个区域发生。甚至在你的地图上也有效！
zh.434169721408614400: 我给你一个我亲手做的，还有设计图也给你，这样你就可以根据需要多做一些了。
zh.434169721878376448: 能再说一遍我该怎么使用干扰探测器吗？
zh.434169722331361280: 我该怎么获得棱镜结晶？
zh.434169723275079680: 别担心，我的脑子有时候也会有点乱。副作用的一部分，嗯……
zh.434169723770007552: 不管怎么说，干扰探测器用法并不复杂。只需要造一个，再把它放在迷宫里任何你想追踪棱镜干扰的地方。
zh.434169724218798080: 一旦放好，干扰探测器就会告诉你那里会不会发生棱镜干扰，或者当前是否正在发生棱镜干扰。
zh.434169724671782912: 迷宫的各处都会发生产生混乱的棱镜干扰，届时你就可以获得棱镜结晶了。棱镜干扰将导致该区域突然散发出棱镜能量，并且该能量会随着时间的推移不断加强。
zh.434169725158322176: 在棱镜干扰期间，你可以在地面上找到食物，这些食物已经因为棱镜核心的影响而变得不稳定。如果你把这些食物喂给史莱姆，那些史莱姆就会产生一个不稳定结晶。
zh.434169725653250048: 不稳定结晶？那我该如何稳定它们？
zh.434169726093651968: 你可以使用在迷宫里找到的稳定器，将不稳定结晶稳定成棱镜结晶。根据我的发现，它们有两种形式。
zh.434169726567608320: 第一种是巨大的环状古代稳定器装置，它们就藏在迷宫里。这些装置外形很大，很容易发现。
zh.434169727016398848: 第二种是无形的时间稳定器，它们会在棱镜干扰期间随机出现，样子是金色的小型能量环。棱镜干扰会带来混乱，所以你得睁大眼睛仔细寻找。
zh.434169727490355200: 在任何情况下，向这些能量环射击不稳定结晶都将产生棱镜结晶。如果找到了古代稳定器，你甚至可以从中跳过去，一次性稳定自己所有的结晶。很好玩的！
zh.434189984019935232: 看来你非常擅长寻找秘密，我花了很长时间才找到的这个地方。
zh.434189987203411968: 这个地方似乎是由秘密堆砌而成的。
zh.434189987656396800: 说到秘密，你为什么要假装是人工智能？
zh.434189988549783552: 看起来确实如此。我怀疑迷宫之所以布局奇特，部分原因是它随着时间的推移不断被扩建。最终，为了使其变得更大，不得不发展出更具创造性的解决方案。
zh.434189989472530432: 你知道迷宫的里面比在外面看着要大吗？我认为这是某种从棱镜核心改造而来的技术。
zh.434189989963264000: 因为虽然这听起来很疯狂，但棱镜核心的能量在其最集中的形式下似乎能够扭曲现实本身。
zh.434189990416248832: 我认为迷宫最终被扩建，是为了尝试容纳棱镜核心的所有能量，然后当这不起作用时，就使用了某种扭曲现实的技术来使其变得更大。
zh.434189990873427968: 但后来在某个时刻，一切都开始失效。而棱镜核心的能量现在正在彩虹岛上四处扩散。
zh.434189991326412800: 我很抱歉，但我当时必须确定我能信任维克多，我需要知道他能否解决我解决不了的问题。你看，迷宫的门对你来说是锁着的，但对我来说不是。至少，现在不是了。
zh.434189991829729280: 在我最初遇到棱镜核心时，在我来到这里之前，在灾难发生之时……它以某种方式给我留下了标记。我试图用防护措施来抵御爆炸。我活了下来，但有些东西变得不同了。
zh.434189992282714112: 棱镜核心的能量特征现在已经成为我的一部分。这就是为什么我不能离它太近，以及为什么我需要你的帮助。
zh.434189992735698944: 所以你得明白，我只是不能再让一切重演。如果我将这个地方的钥匙交给了错误的人……嗯，你得相信我，这是我们最后的机会了。
zh.434189993696194560: 如果说有谁能找到它，那就是你，碧翠丝。
zh.434192420939919360: 我喜欢把这个地方叫做梦幻之地。我过去常常来到这里，在云朵之间消磨时光。这是一个忘却麻烦的好地方。
zh.434192423401975808: 这是迷宫产生大气的地方吗？
zh.434192424307945472: 我觉得是时候由我自己去探索这片梦幻之地了。
zh.434192424760930304: 是的，我想是的，甚至不止大气。这里的空气中有些异样的东西，用语言很难解释，但感觉几乎就像是你周围的云朵，甚至你现在站立的岛屿，都是由你周围的虚空形成的。
zh.434192425192943616: 它不是建造或组装起来的，而更像是从空气中微小的虚无领域聚集而来。我在这些岛屿上待了很长时间，有时我发誓我能感受到它在流动，就像我开始对它有了控制力一样。
zh.434192425650122752: 有一天，我坐在这里时突然有点想家。我回想起小时候，傍晚时分我会在妈妈的花园里，开始闻到我们家房子里飘来的晚餐香味。
zh.434192426132467712: 我过去喜欢一边看着蔬菜在我面前生长，一边闻着空气中飘来的它们被做熟后的香气。这感觉就像是事物会以某种方式联系在一起。
zh.434192426606424064: 然后当我坐在这里时，我闭上眼睛试图再次想象那个花园，就在那一刻，我发誓我能闻到晚餐的香味。
zh.434192427101351936: 当我睁开眼睛时，面前的远处出现了一座新的岛屿，上面正是我成长过程中住过的房子。但它只出现了一会儿，然后就消失在云层中了……
zh.434192427579502592: 我曾经有很多梦想。我想要摆脱父母对我的期望。我想要掌控自己的道路。所以我梦想着摆脱束缚，成为我想成为的那个人。
zh.434192428028293120: 我梦想着有一天他们会看到我成为的那个人，并为我感到高兴。一切都会自然而然地变好，就算我离开了他们也没关系。
zh.434192428472889344: 但当你年轻时，你有时根本意识不到眼前的事物是多么的支离破碎。你对世界的看法就像是一面雾蒙蒙的浴室镜子，能看到事物的轮廓，却看不清细节。
zh.434192428925874176: 我现在知道了，我母亲从未从我外婆的去世中走出来。我没有意识到她为了延续传统所承受的压力，以及那种成为她生活一部分的悲伤……直到我离开很久之后才懂。
zh.434192429374664704: 现在我梦想着有一天我能回到我的家，我的父母也会理解我为当初不得不离开的苦衷。我想，归根结底……你只是希望他们能理解你。
zh.434192429836038144: 小心脚下，梦想可能就像这样戛然而止。
zh.434196761864204288: 你好啊，碧翠丝。看来你还没有迷失在梦中。
zh.434196764397563904: 这里的一切似乎都在变成金子……
zh.434196765337088000: 是的，由于梦幻之地靠近棱镜核心，你正在看到它产生的最糟糕的一些影响。
zh.434196765790072832: 在这里，我见过水变成玻璃，树木变成金属，整个围绕棱镜核心的结构都变得几乎看不见，然后完全消失，就好像它们直接从现实位面蒸发了一样。
zh.434196766251446272: 如果我们不阻止，梦幻之地的每一寸都将变成金子。你站立的地方将变得沉重并从天空坠落。随着时间的推移，这里产生的大气将崩塌，从而进一步破坏迷宫的稳定性。
zh.434196766717014016: 一旦迷宫坠落，棱镜核心的能量会辐射到致远牧星的每一个角落，将这个世界变得面目全非，并带走这个星球上的所有生命。
zh.434196767660732416: 是的，即使是顽强的史莱姆也不可能在这样的灾难中幸存。但我们不会让这种事情发生。我们会找到办法的。
zh.434196768130494464: 我一直都感到迷茫。但没有什么比穿越玻璃荒漠时更让我迷茫了。
zh.434196769053241344: 没错，实际上穿过了两次，你敢信吗？说真的，我差点死在那儿……
zh.434196769531392000: 你看，当我开始研究玻璃荒漠时，我发现这个名字跟这个地方一点都不搭，因为我看到的是郁郁葱葱、生机勃勃的景象。
zh.434196769996959744: 这是因为那里流淌着一种非常特别的水，它几乎可以用神乎奇迹的方式促进生长。好吧，我在开玩笑，你对那地方的情况了如指掌。
zh.434196770475110400: 所以正因如此，我才没有做好充分的准备。而在我返回的途中……玻璃荒漠为自己正名了。
zh.434196770932289536: 那是一片贫瘠的荒地。风像刀子一样刮在我的脸上，迷了我的眼睛。每次我以为我找到了方向，我周围的世界就会燃烧起火焰。
zh.434196771376885760: 你是如何找到继续前进的力量的？
zh.434196771855036416: 琪琪停顿了一会儿，用手指拨弄着她的斗篷。
zh.434196772320604160: 这件斗篷是我外婆的，其实这是她晚年时用来盖在腿上的毯子，至少我在照片上看到的是这样。然后毯子传给了我母亲，直到她又把它给了我。
zh.434196772781977600: 妈妈过去总是在它一有破损的时候就把它缝补好。这么多细小杂乱的针脚，就像她努力维持生活的方式。
zh.434196773243351040: 有一天，我坐在一个洞穴的地面上，听着外面呼啸而过的风暴。我裹着斗篷，因为这铺天盖地的重压而哭泣。我很疲惫，身边的一切压得我喘不过气。
zh.434196773717307392: 突然我感觉到我的母亲在保护我。我看着周围这些七扭八歪的针脚，意识到她缝缝补补、维系一切的努力都是为了我，哪怕要为之付出代价。
zh.434196774170292224: 也许现在它已经破烂不堪，再也回不到以前的样子。但它仍然在这里。它救了我，就像我们将要拯救这个地方一样。也许这里再也回不到以前的样子，但是我们将共同维系这一切，碧翠丝。
zh.434198584142491648: 难以置信，你已经走到了这么远，碧翠丝。这个迷宫会把一个普通人吞噬殆尽。但你，你与众不同。我选择信任你，当真是个明智的决定。
zh.434198586608742400: 棱镜核心就在前方……也许现在我们联手，就有机会阻止这一切，改变致远牧星的未来……
zh.434198587065921536: 我们故事的结局将在我们下一次内容更新中揭晓！与此同时，请大家一定要探索迷宫，随时随地和琪琪聊天，以及使用装置建设基础设施来帮助你踏上旅途。
